title: As a User, I want to Navigate to and View the Employee Roster Widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permissions for the Employees Widget
custom_steps: WHEN the user is in Rosters Dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN Employees Tab should be located under Rosters Dashboard
AND Employees" tab should be placed in alphabetical order on the dashboard and sub-menu
AND Browser tab text should say "Employees" 
AND Will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND Default Sort is Alpha by Employee Name
AND Employee Name column will be a hyperlink to the employee's profile

Wireframe:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=roster

**Note:** Clicking on "Rosters" in the left nav should continue loading the MJ/MN Rosters tab by default

title: As a User, I want there to be a Phone Number section on an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Phone Number section on the employee profile
AND the section will match the provided wireframe and data discovery
AND the section will be editable in edit mode
AND Phone numbers may be added and deleted
AND this section will work the same way it does on player profiles

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to Edit an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile
custom_expected:
THEN an Edit(grey) button will be available anytime the form is in view mode if the viewing user has edit permissions for the form in its current state. 
AND Clicking  Edit will reload the form in edit mode, and a Save(grey) button will appear in place of the Edit button (no edit button displayed in edit mode).
AND Editable fields will match what is in the provided Data Discovery (Note the special behaviors)

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to view an Employee Profile for a former Domestic Amateur Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile who was a former Domestic Amateur Player
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking the employees name in the Employees widget will load the employees profile
AND Browser tab text should say "Profile - [Last Name], [Roster First]"
AND the profile will match the provided data discovery and wire-  If an employee was a former player, use player profile and the employee profile header
AND these players include anyone who had previously been entered as a domestic amateur player
AND These profiles should include the History, Info, Contracts, and Draft & Scouting tabs

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

title: As a User, I want to view an Employee Profile for a former International Amateur Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile who was a former International Amateur Player
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking the employees name in the Employees widget will load the employees profile
AND Browser tab text should say "Profile - [Last Name], [Roster First]"
AND The profile will match the provided data discovery and wire-  If an employee was a former player, use player profile and the employee profile header
AND These players include anyone who had previously been entered as an international amateur player
AND These profiles should include the History, Info, Contracts, International, and Draft & Scouting tabs

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

title: As a User, I want to Save an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile in Edit mode
custom_expected:
THEN A Save button will be available anytime the form is in edit mode. 
AND Clicking Save will save the profile and it's current values and reload the profile in view mode. 
AND Required field and format checks will be made on Save.
AND After a successful save the system will display a successful save blue notification. See Messages #77.
AND Whenever the form is in edit mode, the user will see a "Cancel" button on the form in grey.

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to perform an Advanced Search for Employees
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is advanced search
custom_steps: WHEN user perform an advanced search for Employees
custom_expected:
THEN "Employees" will be an option under "Search Type" (alpha)
AND Filters and result columns will match provided documentation

title: As a user I want to see the Create New icon on an employee profile if I have create permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user has permission to the following:
  - MJ Contract Admin
  - MN Contract Admin
  - Employee Transactions Admin
custom_steps: WHEN user is in Employee Profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a Create New icon on an Employee Profile: 
Or If they do not have any of these permissions, then they do not see the create new icon on an employee profile.

title: As a user I do not want to see "Employee Transactions" as an option if I don't have create permissions
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is attempting to create a new Employee Transaction for an Employee
AND logged in user does NOT have Create Permissions for Employee Transactions
(Does not have the following:
- MJ Contract Admin
- MN Contract Admin
- Employee Transactions Admin)
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to the Employee Profile
custom_expected:
THEN the user should NOT see the "Transactions" option in the employee create new menu
BUT if the user DOES have the permissions listed above, then the use SHOULD see the "Transactions" option in the Employee Create New menu

title: As a User, I want to View an existing Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Employees widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on employee name
custom_expected:
THEN system will load the employees profile
AND Browser tab text should say "Profile - [Last Name], [Roster First]"
AND The profile will match the provided data discovery and wire

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

title: As a User, I want to Create a New Employee
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is in Employee roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Create New button
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch a new blank profile in edit mode
AND the new profile will match the provided wire and data discovery

Wires:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=roster
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=create_a_new_employee

title: As a User, I want to Cancel an Employee Profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps:
WHEN user opens an employee profile in Edit mode
AND user clicks on Cancel button
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking "Cancel" will prompt the user to confirm that they wish to cancel the changes they have made. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation and the form has not yet been saved in the system, then the form should be closed and no record should be kept. User should be returned to their entry point. 
AND If they confirm the cancellation and the profile has been previously saved in the system, then the profile should be reloaded in view mode, with none of the edits that were made since the last save and up to the cancellation point reflected.
AND If they do not confirm the cancellation then the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile

title: As a User, I want to see an Employee Profile for a former Professional Player
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is in Employee Widget
custom_steps: WHEN user opens an employee profile who was a former player
custom_expected:
THEN Clicking the employees name in the Employees widget will load the employees profile
AND Browser tab text should say "Profile - [Last Name], [Roster First]"
AND The profile will match the provided data discovery and wire-  If an employee was a former player, use player profile and the employee profile header
AND These players include anyone that has signed a player contract at some point
AND All appropriate player profile tabs should be present (History, Info, Contracts, Waivers & Trans, International, Draft & Scouting, Service, Stats)

Wire:
http://hri2kq.axshare.com/#p=employee_profile_-_past_player

title: Employee Profile - Viewer Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with Employee Profile Viewer Permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user attempt to view an Employee Profile anywhere in the system
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to view all employee profiles 
BUT user should not be able to make any updates

title: Employee Profile - Edit Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with Employee Profile edit permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to an employee profile
custom_expected:
THEN if user has this permission they should see an Edit button on the Employee Profile
 BUT if user does not have this permission they should NOT not see the Edit button

title: Employee Advance Search Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in with permissions for Employee Advanced Search
custom_steps: When user navigates to advanced search
custom_expected:
THEN user with this permission should be able to view the Employee Search Type 
AND user with this permission should be able to conduct an advance search for Employees
 BUT user without this permission should NOT see Employees as an option under search type

title: As a user I want to see a Create New on the Employee Roster widget
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC or club user is logged in
AND the user has Employee Transactions or Employee Contracts Admin level permissions
AND the user is in Employee Roster widget
custom_steps: WHEN viewing the Employee Roster widget
custom_expected:
THEN user should see a "Create New icon" on the Employee Roster widget.
AND the Create New icon should show for all Orgs for the BOC
BUT the Create New icon should only show the Club's Org when a Club user is viewing the widget. 
AND The create new icon should match what it does from the Employee Profile and be usable.

title: Employee Roster Widget -  Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC or club user is logged in with Employee Transaction Permissions
custom_steps: WHEN the users clicks on Employees
custom_expected:
THEN Users with this permission will be able to navigate to and view the Employee Roster Widget
OR Users without this permission will not see the link to navigate to the Employees Dashboard tab
